Name: Judgement Day
Ingredients: 30 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Charles was pretty sour about his experience when he created this very aromatic sour.
History: On 16th May 2008, superstar bartender Charles Vexenat was unjustly jailed in New Orleans during Tales of the Cocktail after his friend Dre dropped a bottle in the Old Absinthe House. Fortunately for Charles he was saved a second day in the slammer by Melanie Asher, owner of Macchu Pisco who bailed them out. This cocktail, created at PDT, New York City, is Charles's tribute to Melanie.
Nutrition: One serving of Judgement Day contains 102 calories
